name: Shawujinmon
description: Shawjamon is based on the Kappa with blue hair, wears clothes and carries a weapon which is his Kouyoujou staff. The staff itself has a revolver-like cylinder at one end and a crescent-shaped blade on the other. The clothing is Japanese-style armor with a Gappa or traveling cloak on his back and a headband covering his eyes. Around his neck is a necklace of nine beads that have eyes and stitched up mouths.
